languages.text: "Так я почитаю духов железа, исполнивших свой долг и ушедших в небытие, призрак. И уповаю, что часть их мудрости перейдет ко мне".
"It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."
languages.original_text: "Так я почитаю духов железа, исполнивших свой долг и ушедших в небытие, призрак. И уповаю, что часть их мудрости перейдет ко мне".

traits.locale_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: 「亡霊よ、これが、己の義務を果たして無へとかえった鉄の精霊をあがめる私のやり方なのだ。私はあえてこうしているのだ、その知恵の一端を授かれるように」
languages.original_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."

traits.locale_text: 「亡霊よ、これが、己の義務を果たして無へとかえった鉄の精霊をあがめる私のやり方なのだ。私はあえてこうしているのだ、その知恵の一端を授かれるように」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: “这就是我向钢铁精魂表达崇敬之情的方式。它们完成了自己的职责，并化作了虚无，鬼魂。我这样做，是希望能从它们那里获得些许智慧。”
languages.original_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."

traits.locale_text: “这就是我向钢铁精魂表达崇敬之情的方式。它们完成了自己的职责，并化作了虚无，鬼魂。我这样做，是希望能从它们那里获得些许智慧。”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: « C'est ainsi que je vénère les esprits de fer qui ont rejoint le néant en accomplissant leur devoir, fantôme. Dans l'espoir de gagner un peu de leur sagesse. »
languages.original_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ainsi que je vénère les esprits de fer qui ont rejoint le néant en accomplissant leur devoir, fantôme. Dans l'espoir de gagner un peu de leur sagesse. »
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: «Es mi forma de venerar a los espíritus de hierro que han hecho su trabajo y se han perdido en la nada, fantasma. Hago esto con la esperanza de obtener algo de su sabiduría».
languages.original_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."

traits.locale_text: «Es mi forma de venerar a los espíritus de hierro que han hecho su trabajo y se han perdido en la nada, fantasma. Hago esto con la esperanza de obtener algo de su sabiduría».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: "So verehre ich die eisernen Geister, die ihre Pflicht getan haben und ins Nichts übergegangen sind, Geist. Ich tue das in der Hoffnung, dass ich einen Teil ihrer Weisheit übernehmen kann."
languages.original_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "So verehre ich die eisernen Geister, die ihre Pflicht getan haben und ins Nichts übergegangen sind, Geist. Ich tue das in der Hoffnung, dass ich einen Teil ihrer Weisheit übernehmen kann."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: "Hayalet, vazifelerini yerine getirip hiçliğe göçmüş demir ruhları bu şekilde onurlandırıyorum. Bilgeliklerinin bir kısmına vakıf olma umuduyla böyle yapıyorum."
languages.original_text: "It is how I venerate the iron spirits who have done their duty and passed into nothingness, ghost. I do this in the hope that I might gain some of their wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "Görevlerini yapmış ve hiçliğe göç etmiş demir ruhları bu şekilde onurlandırıyorum hayalet. Onların bilgeliğinin bir kısmını kazanma umuduyla yapıyorum bunu."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
